Optimized journey path resolver with caching, early exit checks, and conditional Liquid rendering.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added feature flags `ANALYTICS_ENABLED` and `HOVERCARDS_ENABLED` to conditionally disable analytics and hovercards.
- Optimized journey path resolver with caching, early exit checks, and conditional Liquid rendering.
- Updated Docker base image to `gh-base-noble:20251217-105955-g05726ec4c`.
- Expanded webhooks README with ownership details, escalation paths, and monitoring procedures.
- Skipped hovercards and analytics tests when features are disabled.

### Title
Add analytics/hovercards flags, optimize journey resolver, update Docker image, expand webhooks docs
